languages.text: {n}Боец с символом инквизитора на броне произносит:{/n} "Лорд-инквизитор повелел нам обеспечивать порядок и безопасность его союзников. Любыми способами вплоть до крайних".

{n}The warrior clad in Inquisitorial armour announces,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor's instructions were to maintain order and ensure his allies' safety. Using any methods, however extreme they may have to be."
languages.original_text: {n}Боец с символом инквизитора на броне произносит:{/n} "Лорд-инквизитор повелел нам обеспечивать порядок и безопасность его союзников. Любыми способами вплоть до крайних".

traits.locale_text: {n}The warrior clad in Inquisitorial armour announces,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor's instructions were to maintain order and ensure his allies' personal safety. Using any methods, however extreme they may have to be."
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

traits.locale_text: {n}The warrior clad in Inquisitorial armour announces,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor's instructions were to maintain order and ensure his allies' personal safety. Using any methods, however extreme they may have to be."

traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}身穿审判庭护甲的战士高声开了口。{/n}“大审判官的指示是：维持秩序，确保盟友的安全，无论多么极端的手段都可以使用。”
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in Inquisitorial armour announces,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor's instructions were to maintain order and ensure his allies' safety. Using any methods, however extreme they may have to be."

traits.locale_text: {n}身穿审判庭护甲的战士高声开了口。{/n}“审判长的指示是：维持秩序，确保盟友的安全，无论多么极端的手段都可以使用。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}異端審問官の鎧をまとった戦士が告げる。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターの指示は、秩序を維持し、味方の安全を確保する事です。どんなに過酷であろうと、私の手法を使わせていただきます」
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in Inquisitorial armour announces,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor's instructions were to maintain order and ensure his allies' safety. Using any methods, however extreme they may have to be."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官の鎧をまとった戦士が告げる。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターの指示は、秩序を維持し、味方の安全を確保する事です。どんなに過酷であろうと、私の手法を使わせていただきます」
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}El guerrero ataviado con armadura inquisitorial anuncia:{/n} «Las instrucciones del Lord Inquisidor eran mantener el orden y garantizar la seguridad de sus aliados. Haciendo lo que hiciera falta, por muy extremo que pareciera».
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in Inquisitorial armour announces,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor's instructions were to maintain order and ensure his allies' safety. Using any methods, however extreme they may have to be."

traits.locale_text: {n}El guerrero ataviado con armadura inquisitorial anuncia:{/n} «Las instrucciones del Lord Inquisidor eran mantener el orden y garantizar la seguridad de sus aliados. Haciendo lo que hiciera falta, por muy extremo que pareciera».
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}Der Krieger in der Rüstung der Inquisition verkündet:{/n} "Die Anweisung des Großinquisitors lautete, die Ordnung zu wahren und die Sicherheit seiner Verbündeten zu gewährleisten. Mit allen verfügbaren Methoden, so extrem sie auch sein mögen."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in Inquisitorial armour announces,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor's instructions were to maintain order and ensure his allies' safety. Using any methods, however extreme they may have to be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Krieger in der Rüstung der Inquisition verkündet:{/n} "Die Anweisung des Großinquisitors lautete, die Ordnung zu wahren und die Sicherheit seiner Verbündeten zu gewährleisten. Mit allen verfügbaren Methoden, so extrem sie auch sein mögen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier en armure de l'Inquisition intervient :{/n} « Les instructions du seigneur inquisiteur sont de préserver l'ordre et d'assurer la sécurité de ses alliés, et ce, à n'importe quel prix. »
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in Inquisitorial armour announces,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor's instructions were to maintain order and ensure his allies' safety. Using any methods, however extreme they may have to be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier en armure de l'Inquisition intervient :{/n} « Les instructions du seigneur inquisiteur sont de préserver l'ordre et d'assurer la sécurité de ses alliés, et ce, à n'importe quel prix. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}Engizisyon zırhları içindeki savaşçı, beyanda bulunuyor.{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun talimatları, düzeni ve müttefiklerinin güvenliğini sağlamak üzerinedir. Gerekirse ekstrem metotlar kullanılacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior clad in Inquisitorial armour announces,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor's instructions were to maintain order and ensure his allies' safety. Using any methods, however extreme they may have to be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Engizisyon zırhları içindeki savaşçı beyan ediyor:{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun talimatları, düzeni ve müttefiklerinin güvenliğini sağlamak üzerineydi. Ekstrem metotlar kullanılması gerekse bile."
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent
